00023 package ikayaki.gui;
00024 
00025 import ikayaki.MeasurementEvent;
00026 import ikayaki.Project;
00027 import ikayaki.ProjectEvent;
00028 import ikayaki.ProjectListener;
00029 
00030 import javax.swing.*;
00031 import java.awt.*;
00032 import java.awt.event.ActionEvent;
00033 import java.awt.event.ActionListener;
00034 import java.awt.event.KeyEvent;
00035 import java.util.Vector;
00036 
00040 public class MeasurementGraphsPanel extends ProjectComponent implements ProjectListener {
00044     private Vector<Plot> plots = new Vector<Plot>();
00045 
00049     public MeasurementGraphsPanel() {
00050 
00051         IntensityPlot intensityPlot = new IntensityPlot();
00052         StereoPlot stereoPlot = new StereoPlot();
00053 
00054         plots.add(intensityPlot);
00055         plots.add(stereoPlot);
00056         //stereoPlot.setEnabled(true);
00057         //intensityPlot.setEnabled(true);
00058 
00059         JButton bigGraphsButton = new JButton();
00060 
00061 
00062         final JTabbedPane tabbedPane = new JTabbedPane();
00063 
00064         tabbedPane.addTab("1: Intensity", intensityPlot);
00065         tabbedPane.setMnemonicAt(0, KeyEvent.VK_1);
00066 
00067         tabbedPane.addTab("2: Stereo", stereoPlot);
00068         tabbedPane.setMnemonicAt(1, KeyEvent.VK_2);
00069 
00070         tabbedPane.addTab("3: Zijderweld", new JPanel());
00071         tabbedPane.setMnemonicAt(2, KeyEvent.VK_3);
00072 
00073         setLayout(new BorderLayout());
00074         add(bigGraphsButton, "North");
00075         add(tabbedPane, "Center");
00076 
00077         // initialize with no project
00078         setProject(null);
00079 
00080 
00081         bigGraphsButton.addActionListener(new ActionListener() {
00082             public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e) {
00083                 JDialog gd = new JDialog(getParentFrame(), "Graphs", false);
00084                 MeasurementGraphsPanel mgp = new MeasurementGraphsPanel();
00085                 mgp.setProject(getProject());
00086                 gd.add(mgp, BorderLayout.CENTER);
00087                 gd.pack();
00088                 Rectangle maxBounds = GraphicsEnvironment.getLocalGraphicsEnvironment().getMaximumWindowBounds();
00089                 gd.setSize((int) (maxBounds.width * 0.5), (int) (maxBounds.height * 0.5));
00090                 gd.setLocationRelativeTo(getParentFrame());
00091                 gd.setVisible(true);
00092             }
00093         });
00094 
00095         return; // TODO
00096     }
00097 
00101     private void updatePlots() {
00102         // update all plots with the MeasurementSteps from the project
00103         for (Plot plot : plots) {
00104             plot.reset();
00105             if (getProject() != null) {
00106                 for (int i = 0; i < getProject().getSteps(); i++) {
00107                     plot.add(getProject().getStep(i));
00108                 }
00109             }
00110         }
00111     }
00112 
00116     public void projectUpdated(ProjectEvent event) {
00117         if (event.getType() == ProjectEvent.Type.STATE_CHANGED || event.getType() == ProjectEvent.Type.DATA_CHANGED) {
00118             updatePlots();
00119         }
00120     }
00121 
00125     public void measurementUpdated(MeasurementEvent event) {
00126         if (event.getType() == MeasurementEvent.Type.VALUE_MEASURED) {
00127             updatePlots();
00128         }
00129     }
00130 
00137     @Override public void setProject(Project project) {
00138         super.setProject(project);
00139         updatePlots();
00140     }
00141 
00142 
00143     public static void main(String args[]) {
00144         JFrame f = new JFrame();
00145         f.setLayout(new BorderLayout());
00146         f.setContentPane(new MeasurementGraphsPanel());
00147         f.setLocationByPlatform(true);
00148         f.setDefaultCloseOperation(JFrame.EXIT_ON_CLOSE);
00149         f.pack();
00150         f.setVisible(true);
00151     }
00152 }
